email.title: Merch Now Available!
email.heading: Hoodies, T-Shirts, and Beanies Are Now Available!
email.text: Reminder: Sales will stop tonight at 23.00 GMT (Sunday 14th January). If you wish to order a hoodie or T-shirt, please do so by 23.00. Beanies are now sold out.

Head on over to the Union's website to buy DoCSoc-branded hoodies, T-shirts, and beanies. We only have a limited number of beanies.
They will be available until Sunday 14th at 23.00, of course at rock bottom prices thanks to our [lovely sponsors](https://docsoc.co.uk/sponsors/). If you are unsure about sizing, please see the following pages: [Hoodie Sizing](https://www.spreadshirt.co.uk/personalised/detail/unisex-hoodie-PT1047?appearance=2) [T-Shirt Sizing](https://www.spreadshirt.co.uk/personalised/detail/unisex-tri-blend-t-shirt-by-bella+canvas-PT1212?appearance=228). We order unisex sizes - generally men should expect a tighter fit and women a looser fit.

Get yours now at the Union's website
